entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
